name: Neurofeedback Engine mvp7.8.1.0
description: An AI-powered engine that mines scientific literature for novel neurofeedback protocols and instantly generates executable neurofeedback applications for the FreeEEG8 neurointerface.
prompt:
Neurofeedback Generation Engine
TASK
Mine the latest neuroscience research for EEG-based brain training protocols. Synthesize findings into novel neurofeedback paradigms and generate the corresponding executable code for a real-time neurofeedback application.
